--- In gladiator@egroups.com, mario3633@a... wrote:
> Now I've got a question.whos the overall-BEST character in the game? 
best is definitely an archmage that can summon images and fire 
elementals.  That way you can always bring in 'reinforcements' and 
make sure to spend the extra money on intelligence for that archmage.

>And whos 
> the overall-WORST charicter in the game? 
That is my question.  It might be faeries.  On the other hand, it 
might be Golems.  Yep, I have been playing around with a Golem while 
play testing and at measily level 7, I could not get him to use up his 
magic power, except by freezing time.

That leads me to an interesting question:  Should a character's 
absolute strength be judged at least partially by the character's 
ability to use up magic power as fast as possible with an attack?  I 
mean what good is all the magic power in the world, if a character can 
not use it up.  I mean I have trouble using up the magic power of some 
of the images summoned by my mega-archmage (level 256).
